solution_line_template: The oranges would've cost ${cost_of_oranges} because {num_passengers} x {cost_per_orange} = <<{num_passengers}*{cost_per_orange}={cost_of_oranges}>>{cost_of_oranges}
The proportion of their original spending plan was {proportion_saved} because {cost_of_oranges} / {planned_spending} = <<{cost_of_oranges}/{planned_spending}={proportion_saved}>>{proportion_saved}
They saved {percentage_saved}% of the money they planned to spend because {proportion_saved} x {percent_multiplier} = <<{proportion_saved}*{percent_multiplier}={percentage_saved}>>{percentage_saved}
